location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 1/1 Shaikh Sir `Isa bin `Ali Al Khalifah, K. C. S. I.'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the volume are mostly arranged in chronological order.

The main foliation is written in pencil, circled, and can be found in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. The numbering commences at the first folio of writing with 1 and terminates at the last folio of writing with 100. An original, but incomplete pagination sequence numbers each page of text between ff. 2-17; these numbers are written in ink, and can be found in the top left or right corners of the verso and recto sides of each folio respectively.

mods.abstract: The volume contains correspondence and telegrams between the Political Agent at Bahrain, the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf and the Ruler of Bahrain, Shaikh `Isa bin `Ali Al Khalifah, in regard to Shaikh `Isa bin `Ali Al Khalifah's opposition to reform and British jurisdiction and his son Shaikh Shaikh ‘Abdullāh bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah's dismissal; and correspondence with Kanga, Bhaishanker and Girdharlal Solicitors at Bombay regarding Shaikh `Isa's allowance.There are some letters in Arabic, to and from the Sheikh of Bahrain.

name.namePart: Shaikh Hakim of Bahrain 'Īsá bin 'Alī Āl Khalīfah
